id.description: The unique identifier of the demographic answer

free_form_text.description: Any additional free-form text provided as part of the answer

application_id.description: The unique identifier of the application associated with the demographic answer

demographic_question_id.description: The identifier of the demographic question to which the answer belongs

demographic_answer_option_id.description: The identifier of the answer option chosen for the demographic question

created_at.description: The date and time when the demographic answer was created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the demographic answer was last updated
